name: Kill the toast zombies
description:
This is my first game jam game ever. 

You are a stickman who needs to kill zombies which are toasts with toast as a weapon. You are a true hero if you make it to the end. 

I had fun making it but it didn't come out as I wanted it. Anyways I hope you liked it and feel free to comment on my game.

You can move with WAD (jump with space or W)
